name: Kostek
description:
Kostek

What is Kostek? what is he doing? what de dog doin? what is love? are all the questions one asked himself, atleast once in his life, well i came here with the anwsers, but just for the first 2, scientist don't yet know what de dog doin, well kostek is a game, where you play as a dice, who's name is Kostek, your goal? warcrimes! game ending the evil cartel dices that run a casino in which you got trapped in!
